#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define sz(c) c.size()
#define fast ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false)
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(typeof(b) i = a;i<=b;++i)
set<char> stp;
map<int,string> mtp;
int main()
{
    fast;
    mtp[0]="Terrorist";
    mtp[1]="Counter Terrorist";
    int tt;
    string s;
    cin>>tt;
    while(tt--)
    {
        cin>>s;
        int l=sz(s);
        FOR(i,0,l-1)
        stp.insert(s[i]);
        cout<<mtp[sz(stp)&1]<<endl;
        stp.clear();
    }
    return 0;}
